name: A Test Before Trying
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Joel H. Cohen, Jon Kern (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: The fate of Springfield Elementary rests on Bart and his test scores, and Homer finds way to make money with his own parking meter.
